channel.title: error on ThingsDB documentation
channel.description: Recent content in error on ThingsDB documentation

item.title: len
item.description: Returns the length of an error message. This function does not generate an event. Function error.len() Arguments None Return value Returns length of an error message. Example This code uses len() to return the length of the error message: type_err("incorrect type given").len(); Return value in JSON format 20
